dct_title_s: Geologische Übersichtskarte eines Teiles des nördlichen Kleinasiens, nach eigenen Beobachtungen und Verwertung älterer Angaben bearbeitet von / Dr. Richard Leonhard.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Toponymes are in Tukish, and in Byzantine Greek in parenthesis : "Antike Namen (byzantinische in Klammern)". Includes lists of explorers names locating route they  followed. Abbreviation list of geographic features, and  pronunciation of Turkish terms.
